1.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is sitting reading a book and hears the bed inNEWLINEJoey's room creaking, and does a 'Oh no, not again' look on his face.

lines.Line: (going to the bedroom) See Joe, that's why your parents told you notNEWLINEto jump on the bed

2.SceneDescription: Street, Phoebe is being followed by some guy, as they pass a flower vendor.NEWLINEPhoebe turns around and the guy quickly picks up some flowers and continues followingNEWLINEher.

lines.Line: (turns around) Um, that's it. No. Hey! You! J. Crew guy. Yeah. Why haveNEWLINEyou been following me? I mean, all week long everywhere I look there's you
You wouldn't return my calls, you sent back my letters...
Oooh. Oh, well this is awkward.
Oooh. Oh, well this is awkward.
Um, yeah, you want Ursula, and I'm Phoebe. Twin sisters! Seriously
Oh, that's great. I'm stalking the wrong woman. I am such a dingus
I just, I want you to know I didn't used to be like this. Before I meetNEWLINEyour sister I was like this normal guy who sold beepers and cellular phones
Well, I mean look it's, it's not your fault, you know. I mean this isNEWLINEjust what, what she does to guys, okay

Wait, (grabs him) you know what, I got a little story. When I was inNEWLINEJunior High School I went through this period where I thought I was a witch. And there wasNEWLINEthis guidance counselor who said something to me, that I think will help you a lot. HeNEWLINEsaid okay, 'you're not a witch you're just an average student.' See what I'm saying
Um, well, get over it. So, I mean you, you just seem to be a really niceNEWLINEguy, you know. Don't be so hard on yourself okay
Wait. You're right. I know you're right. And, thanks for being so nice.NEWLINEHere (gives her the flowers he bought.
Oh, thanks a lot. Do you want to get a cup of coffee
Oh, thanks a lot. Do you want to get a cup of coffee
Okay. (they start to leave, he is still following her) Okay, you don'tNEWLINEhave to walk behind me any more

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is putting jam on his muffin, lots of jam

lines.Line: Remember when you where a kid and your Mom would drop you off at theNEWLINEmovies with a jar of jam and a little spoon
Hey, oh, you know that guy who's been following me? I talked to himNEWLINEtoday
(with food in his mouth) You talked to him. Are you crazy
(with food in his mouth) You talked to him. Are you crazy

Okay, first I'm not crazy. And second, say it don't spray it. Anyway hisNEWLINEname is Malcom, and he wasn't following me, I mean he was, but 'cause he thought I wasNEWLINEUrsula, ick. And, that's why, that's why he couldn't just come up and talk to me. 'CauseNEWLINEof the restraining order

Ooh! No, no, no, no, he's not like a kook, no. He's just like this, thisNEWLINEvery passionate, incredibly romantic guy, that got like a tinsy bit carried away, youNEWLINEknow. And we just get along really well, and he's so cute
Oh my God, you've got a crush on your sister's stalker
Oh my God, you've got a crush on your sister's stalker
No, I'm just gonna help him, you know, get 'de-Ursula-ized', like youNEWLINEknow, like I did for Joey after he went out with her
(with his mouthful) Hey, I didn't stalk her. I mean (he sprays Phoebe withNEWLINEcrumbs)
Okay, I asked for the news, not the weather
Okay, I asked for the news, not the weather
Okay, I asked for the news, not the weather
Joey, this is for you. (gives him a jar of jam) It's blackberry curin
Hey, Joe, I gotta ask. The girl from the Xerox place buck naked (holdsNEWLINEup one hand), or, or a big tub of jam. (holds up the other hand
Joey, take your time with that. That's my last batch
Well, what happened to your jam plan
I figured out I need to charge seventeen bucks a jar just to break even.NEWLINESo, I've got a new plan now. Babies
Well, your gonna need much bigger jars
Well, your gonna need much bigger jars
I'm talking about me having a baby

Yeah. The great thing about the jam plan was, I was taking control of myNEWLINElife. So I asked myself, what is the most important thing to me in the world and that'sNEWLINEwhen I came up with the baby plan.
Well, aren't you forgetin' something? What, what, what is uh, what is thatNEWLINEguy's name? Dad
It took me 28 years to find one man that I wanna spend my life with, ifNEWLINEI have to wait another 28 years then, I'll be 56 before I can have a baby, and that's justNEWLINEstupid
I don't need an actual man, just a couple of his best swimmers. AndNEWLINEthere, there are places you can go to get that stuff

4.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Malcom is giving Phoebe all of his spy stuff

lines.Line: Oh, great. Great. You're doing great, you know real strong. GoingNEWLINEstrong. Keep going
These are my night vision goggles. This is the book I pretend to readNEWLINEwhen I'm watching her in the park. And these are Mad Lips, they're just for fun
Oh, yeah. What's this? (picks up a book
Oh, yeah. What's this? (picks up a book
Oh, yeah. What's this? (picks up a book
Oh, this is log I kept, recording her every movement. Do you wanna hereNEWLINEsomething from it
Um, not even a little bit
Um, not even a little bit
Um, not even a little bit
(reading) I met Phoebe today. She was really nice to me eventhough I'mNEWLINEsuch a loser. And, then when I was walking home I thought about her a lot, it was weird,NEWLINEbut kinda cool
Good. So what were you thinking
Good. So what were you thinking
I was thinking what it would be like to kiss you
I was thinking what it would be like to kiss you
See that's just something I said now, so that maybe I could kiss you
Oh my God, what happened? (points to the cast on Janice's wrist
Oh. God, crazy Chandler. He spun me...off...the...bed
Wow! Spinning that sounds like fun
Wow! Spinning that sounds like fun
Oh, (laughs) I wish. No, you know he was just trying Ross's Hug and RollNEWLINEthing.
You know what, where he hugs you and kinda rolls you away and... Oh...NEWLINEmy....God

6.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Joey is entering

lines.Line: So you're really doing this, huh
No, I-I figured you would've picked a blond guy
I don't know, I just always pictured you ending up with one of those tall,NEWLINEsmart blond guys, name like.... Hoyt
It's a name, yeah. I saw you, you know, in this great house with a bigNEWLINEpool
He's got the body for it
He's got the body for it
I like that. (Joey starts laughing) What
You guys have one of those signs that says: 'We don't swim in your toilet,NEWLINEso don't pee in our pool.', you know
We do not have one of those signs
We do not have one of those signs
We do not have one of those signs
Sure you do, it was a gift from me. Oh! And you have these three greatNEWLINEkids
And, and, and they wear those little water wings, you know. And they're,NEWLINEthey're running around on the deck. Then Hoyt wraps this big towel around all three ofNEWLINEthem
Sure! (Monica gets very depressed) But hey, you know this way sounds goodNEWLINEtoo.
Oh Monica. (goes over and hugs her, then looks at the form and stopsNEWLINEhugging her.) Wow, this guy's an astronaut. That would've been cool, (sees Monica) forNEWLINElike a day. (hugs her again)
